templateItems.parameter: Not Here (One, Interpretation from the Ten Ox Herding Pictures)

The Winged Victory (Nike) of Samothrace has been re-named and reconfigured to address the existential comingling of victory with death, as well as to elevate the idea of victory over death to a philosophic consideration.
templateItems.item: Wood, salt, burlap, copper, beeswax, LCD monitor, audio speakers, DVD player, video documented performance

We are dissuaded by thoughts and other stimuli from being present with the kind of clarity described in Zazen, wherein the clear mind is like the surface of a mirror, reflecting all that goes before it without itself being disturbed. There are continual agitations and seductions that generate turbulence and pull us away from clarity and equanimity. We seek what we already have.
